comments.body: RIPPER ALERT!!!!!!!!He gonna block you instantly after receiving payment. I was about to buy $100 account but he was not ready to give account first and said he don’t know escrow thing. Took risk of $30 for small denomination account and same shit happened. Instantly blocked after he got payment. He is even gonna send you some other website as a proof that he is selling account since 2019 don’t get into his words.
